data.title: CommQuest voted Best Overall Company to Work For
data.meta_description: CommQuest Services was recently named the “Best Company to Work for” in Stark County for businesses that employ between 250-500 employees. The award was given to CommQuest after receiving the […]
data.text:
CommQuest Services was recently named the “Best Company to Work for” in Stark County for businesses that employ between 250-500 employees. The award was given to CommQuest after receiving the most votes in the “Best of the Best” contest by readers of the Canton Repository.

This is a significant honor to be chosen by the readers of the Canton Repository as the best company to work for,” said CommQuest Services CEO, Keith Hochadel. “There are many great companies in Stark County, and we are honored that the community recognizes the incredible work our staff does every day to provide hope to those struggling.”

The annual Best of the Best contest is held every spring by the Canton Repository and includes more than 25 categories spanning different industries, businesses, and professionals in Stark County. During the contest nearly 300,000 votes were cast.

Watch the video below featuring CommQuest employees describing why they enjoy being part of the CommQuest family.
